name: Phantoms Of Sand
description:
A terrible curse has struck this desert...

Now it's up to you, fellow traveller, to undo this horrible curse. Gather the totems necessary for the ritual, but beware of the phantoms roaming the sands. Invisible to the naked eye, their footprints are still visible in the sand. Keep your eyes peeled and tread carefully...

(Includes multiple endings!)

Not a fan of deliberately lowres games for stupid nostalgia reasons?

Don't worry, there's an HD version just for you :)
